---
title: "BAR"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
example("barplot")
```


```{r}
x <- c("A", "B", "C", "D")
y <- c(2, 4, 6, 8)

barplot(y, names.arg = x)
```

```{r}
x <- c("A", "B", "C", "D")
y <- c(2, 4, 6, 8)

barplot(y, names.arg = x, col = "red")
```

```{r}
x <- c("A", "B", "C", "D")
y <- c(2, 4, 6, 8)

barplot(y, names.arg = x, density = 10)
```

```{r}
x <- c("A", "B", "C", "D")
y <- c(2, 4, 6, 8)

barplot(y, names.arg = x, width = c(1,2,3,4))
```

```{r}
x <- c("A", "B", "C", "D")
y <- c(2, 4, 6, 8)

barplot(y, names.arg = x, horiz = TRUE)
```
